com.iland.core.web.rest.api

Interface UserResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    @Path(value="/user")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
public interface UserResource
extends Serializable
    User Resource Interface v1.
    Author:
    Cory Snyder

      • countMessagesFor

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{username}/{folder}/count")

        message count

      • moveMessage

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{username}/message/{uuid}/move")

                                                                                                                                                                                                        MoveMessageSpec spec)

        Parameters:

        uuid - unique message identifier

        inbox message

      • getMessagesHeadersFor

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{username}/{folder}/messages/headers")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<InboxMessage> getMessagesHeadersFor(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                 String username,
                                                                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="folder")
                                                                                                                                                                 String folder,
                                                                                                                                                                 @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                                                                                 int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                 @QueryParam(value="batchSize")
                                                                                                                                                                 int batchSize)
        Returns user's message headers for the given folder, ordered by time desc.
        Parameters:
        folder - a folder
        username - unique username as seen by iland AD
        Returns:
        inbox message headers

      • addVmAlertSubscription

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vm/{vmUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
UserVmResourceAlert addVmAlertSubscription(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="vmUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   String vmUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   UserVmResourceAlert alert)
        Add a Vm Resource Alert for a given username and Vm. Valid counters to alert on:
        Group     Name Type
        cpu readyPercent summation
        cpu usage average
        net usage average
        disk numberIOPsAveraged average
        mem consumed average
        mem vmmemctl average
        Parameters:
        username - username to add alert for
        vmUuid - vm uuid to add alert for
        alert - vm resource alert definition
        Returns:
        vm resource alert

      • updateVmAlertSubscriptions

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vm/{vmUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<UserVmResourceAlert> updateVmAlertSubscriptions(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            @PathParam(value="vmUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            String vmUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            List<UserVmResourceAlert> alerts)
        Update Vm resource alerts for a given user and Vm. Valid counters to alert on:
        Group     Name Type
        cpu readyPercent summation
        cpu usage average
        net usage average
        disk numberIOPsAveraged average
        mem consumed average
        mem vmmemctl average
        Parameters:
        username - username to update alerts for
        vmUuid - vm uuid to update alerts for
        alerts - list of vm resource alerts
        Returns:
        list of updated vm resource alerts

      • getVmAlertSubscription

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vm/{vmUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<UserVmResourceAlert> getVmAlertSubscription(@PathParam(value="username")

                                                                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="vmUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                           String vmUuid)
        Retrieve Vm Resource alerts for a given username and Vm.
        Parameters:
        username - username to retrieve alerts for
        vmUuid - vm uuid to retrieve alerts for
        Returns:
        list of vm resource alerts

      • removeVmAlertSubscription

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vm/{vmUuid}/remove")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
UserVmResourceAlert removeVmAlertSubscription(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathParam(value="vmUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String vmUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             UserVmResourceAlert alert)
        Remove a Vm Resource Alert for a given username and Vm.
        Parameters:
        username - username to add alert for
        vmUuid - vm uuid to add alert for
        alert - user vm resource alert
        Returns:
        vm resource alert

      • addVappAlertSubscription

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vapp/{vappUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
UserVappResourceAlert addVappAlertSubscription(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="vappUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           String vappUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="cloneToChildVms")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           boolean cloneToChildVms,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           UserVappResourceAlert alert)
        Add a Vapp Resource Alert for a given username and Vapp. Valid counters to alert on:
        Group     Name Type
        cpu readyPercent summation
        cpu usage average
        net usage average
        disk numberIOPsAveraged average
        mem consumed average
        mem vmmemctl average
        Parameters:
        username - username to add alert for
        vappUuid - vapp uuid to add alert for
        alert - vapp resource alert definition
        cloneToChildVms - whether to clone the resource alert to all child VMs
        Returns:
        vapp resource alert

      • getVappAlertSubscription

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vapp/{vappUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<UserVappResourceAlert> getVappAlertSubscription(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                   String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="vappUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                   String vappUuid)
        Retrieve Vapp Resource alerts for a given username and Vapp.
        Parameters:
        username - username to retrieve alerts for
        vappUuid - vapp uuid to retrieve alerts for
        Returns:
        list of vapp resource alerts

      • updateVappAlertSubscriptions

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vapp/{vappUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<UserVappResourceAlert> updateVappAlertSubscriptions(@PathParam(value="username")

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="vappUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String vappUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    List<UserVappResourceAlert> alerts)
        Update Vapp resource alerts for a given user and Vapp. Valid counters to alert on:
        Group     Name Type
        cpu readyPercent summation
        cpu usage average
        net usage average
        disk numberIOPsAveraged average
        mem consumed average
        mem vmmemctl average

        vappUuid - vapp uuid to update alerts for
        alerts - list of vapp resource alerts
        Returns:
        list of updated vapp resource alerts

      • removeVappAlertSubscription

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vapp/{vappUuid}/remove")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
UserVappResourceAlert removeVappAlertSubscription(@PathParam(value="username")

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     @PathParam(value="vappUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     String vappUuid,

        vappUuid - vapp uuid to add alert for
        alert - vapp resource alert
        Returns:
        vapp resource alert

      • addVdcAlertSubscription

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/vdc/{vdcUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
UserVdcResourceAlert addVdcAlertSubscription(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @PathParam(value="vdcUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String vdcUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       UserVdcResourceAlert alert)
        Add a Vdc Resource Alert for a given username and Vdc. Valid counters to alert on:
        Group     Name Type
        cpu readyPercent summation
        cpu usage average
        net usage average
        disk numberIOPsAveraged average
        mem consumed average
        mem vmmemctl average
        Parameters:
        username - username to add alert for
        vdcUuid - vdc uuid to add alert for
        alert - vdc resource alert definition
        Returns:
        vdc resource alert

      • addExtNetworkAlertSubscription

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{username}/alerts/resource/external-network/{externalNetworkUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
UserExtNetworkResourceAlert addExtNetworkAlertSubscription(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @PathParam(value="externalNetworkUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              String externalNetworkUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              UserExtNetworkResourceAlert alert)
        Add an external network Resource Alert for a given username and external network. External network alerts can be set on the following performance counter groups
        • in
        • out
        • total
        with the following performance counter names
        • average
        with the following performance counter types
        • kbps
        The following equality conditions can be used
        • <=
        • >=
        A breach period (a postive integer) must also be supplied detailing how many consecutive minutes the alert must be met for the actual alert to be triggered.
        Parameters:
        username - username to add alert for
        externalNetworkUuid - external network uuid to add alert for
        alert - external network resource alert definition
        Returns:
        external network resource alert

      • updateExtNetworkAlertSubscriptions

      • getLoginEvents

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{username}/login-events")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<LoginEvent> getLoginEvents(@PathParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                           String username,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                                                           Integer offset,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                           Integer limit)
        Get login events for a user. Login events include both successfull and unsuccessful login attempts. The type field of the returned login events will either be 'LOGIN' (meaning success) or 'LOGIN_ERROR' (meaning login failure. You may request at most 100 events at a time.
        Parameters:
        username - the user's username
        offset - the offset of the first event to retrieve
        limit - the limit of the nubmer of login events to retrieve
        Returns:
        list of login events
